variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a missense mutation resulting in an amino acid substitution (Pro129Thr) in the protein.

Described Disease.Described Disease: Mitochondrial Encephalomyopathy, Lactic Acidosis and Stroke-Like Episodes (MELAS)

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HUVEC cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_012594.6:c.387C>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
